description: If a, b in sequence, so is a*b-1.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: f[l_] := Block[{k = l}, Select[ Union[ Flatten[ AppendTo[k, Table[ k[[i]]*k[[j]] - 1, {i, 1, Length[k]}, {j, 1, i}]]]], # < 170 &]]; NestList[f, {2}, 6][[ -1]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 23 2004 *)
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)a009388 n = a009388_list !! (n-1)a009388_list = f [2] (singleton 2) where   f xs s = m : f xs' (foldl (flip insert) s' (map (pred . (* m)) xs'))     where xs' = m : xs           (m,s') = deleteFindMin s-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 15 2011
